holidays.title: National Donut Day
holidays.description: We are gearing up to savor our best-loved fried dough confections!

holidays.title: American Indian Citizenship Day
holidays.description: In 1924, the Indian Citizenship Act granted citizenship to all American Indians born in the U.S.

holidays.title: Isabel Province Day
holidays.description: This Isabel Province Day, take some time to learn about the province.

holidays.title: Republic Day Italy
holidays.description: It’s time to raise the tricolor flags with Italians as they achieved their freedom on this day.

holidays.title: National Bubba Day
holidays.description: Bubba is a nickname or a pet name given to someone as a term of endearment.

holidays.title: National First Ladies Day
holidays.description: Take a look at the many contributions America’s First Ladies passed on to the nation.

holidays.title: National I Love My Dentist Day
holidays.description: This day is dedicated to dentists for all the fantastic work they do to keep us smiling.

holidays.title: National Janice Day
holidays.description: This National Janice Day, let’s explore the origin and meaning of the name Janice.

holidays.title: National Leave the Office Early Day
holidays.description: A day for those who find themselves living to work instead of working to live.

holidays.title: National Rocky Road Day
holidays.description: This day commemorates the iconic flavor of the rocky road dessert.

holidays.title: National Rotisserie Chicken Day
holidays.description: Rotisserie chicken is prepared in a slow cooking method that seals in the flavor.

holidays.title: Platinum Jubilee bank holiday
holidays.description: Join the people celebrating Her Majesty The Queen’s historic reign and take part in the activities.

holidays.title: Randol Fawkes Labour Day
holidays.description: Join the parade as we celebrate and show our appreciation this Randol Fawkes Labor Day.

holidays.title: Beetlejuice’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meet Lester Green, A.K.A. Beetlejuice, the greatest Wack Packer of all time.

holidays.title: Charlie Watts’s Birthday
holidays.description: This legendary drummer and musician achieved the highest levels of musical success.

holidays.title: John Randolph’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this political activist, freedom and principle were the only ways forward.

holidays.title: Willow Sage Hart’s Birthday
holidays.description: This child singer has her whole life to create unique world-stopping music.
